abstract: Even though women represent about half of the nation’s work force, most companies in the S.&P. 100 have no female or minority representation in their highest-paid executive positions, Calvert Investments concluded in a report released Thursday.
snippet: Even though women represent about half of the nation’s work force, most companies in the S.&P. 100 have no female or minority representation in their highest-paid executive positions, Calvert Investments concluded in a report released Thursday.
lead_paragraph: Even though women represent about half of the nation’s work force, most companies in the S.&P. 100 have no female or minority representation in their highest-paid executive positions, Calvert Investments concluded in a report released Thursday.

headline.main: Still Few Women at the Top in Most Big U.S. Companies
